skillDetails.name: Charged Reflexes
skillDetails.description: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster gains a Charge Stack, it has a 5% chance to also gain Might, Agility or Sidekick (Buffs).

monstersWithSkill.skillDescription: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster gains a Charge Stack, it has a 5% chance to also gain Might, Agility or Sidekick (Buffs).
